Row.Text: Tongan Unique Naval Unit. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tier 2 Tongan Unique Naval Unit. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tier 3 Tongan Unique Naval Unit. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tongan Unique Scout. Can enter Ocean (does not take damage). Cannot disembark in Distant Lands. Can use [icon:Action_Pillage] Coastal Raid on adjacent Discoveries and embark at the start of the age.
